edu.jhu.coe.syntax
Class StateSet

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.coe.syntax.StateSet
Direct Known Subclasses:
StateSetWithFeatures
public class StateSet
extends Object

Represent parsetrees, with each node consisting of a label and a list of children. The score tables are not allocated by the constructor and allocate() and deallocate() must be called manually. This is to allow more control over memory usage.

Author:
Slav Petrov, Romain Thibaux
